room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
review: Amazing customer service! Loved the location, the filter water station and the waiting area. Bathrooms were very clean. The escape room was nicely laid out and well thought out clues. Would definitely return! #WeEscaped

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
review: It was a great experience resulting from every employee explaining the rules of the game, the room/facility was very clean and the game itself really forced you to work as a team which was the purpose of all of us getting together in the first place. Will definitely do it again!!!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
review: The staff was amazing and so supportive!!! They explained the rules and everything really well and the workers TRULY have fun with their job!!! The way the rooms are set up is super cool too!!! 10/10 would recommend

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
review: It was a great experience. The whole game was well planned out and there was no hiccups. We went as a group of 8 and it was awsome. We would definitely do this again for our vacation!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
review: Clean, well lit and fun escape room.The staff were very nice and helpful setting up. Pretty affordable compared to other places. They do run deals online so look those up before you go!
